customer_reviews.title: Bad Zipper = Bad start to trip
customer_reviews.text: I am sitting at the airport using my brand new suitcase. Big problem. The zipper has already split open like a cheap jacket. Zipped on either end but teeth of zipper in mid area have split. Swell. Cannot return as have had 1 month past deadline for return. Thankfully always travel with 2 luggage belts...saved the day. Hell of a way to begin a 3 week overseas trip
customer_reviews.author: vieuxcarre

customer_reviews.title: Should have done more research

customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Zippers not conducive for flying
customer_reviews.text: The zipper pull tabs have large openings in the middle of them which cause the zippers to get stuck on things when being handled by airline baggage equipment. The zippers on the front zipper pockets of both my 25 inch bag and 30 inch bag completely ripped off and apparently repairing the zippers and what I lost because the pockets were then open are not covered by Airlines.
customer_reviews.author: lynoln

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic carry-on suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic carry-on suitcase! It is very lightweight and looks just like the pictures. The way that the carrying handle is mounted is the side is perpendicular to the way that most such handles are mounted, but it is still possible to carry it with the handle. I ordered it from Amazon Warehouse Deals, and it arrived with no problem or damage. It rolls very easily, and the handle deploys and retracts very easily. It fits in the overhead compartment of an airplane with no problem. The inside has 2 pockets for shoes, one visible in the pictures above and one on the other side. I highly recommend this suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Great little carry on

I loved my 21", but will be taking this on many of my adventures now.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, very dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsonite luggage but don't waste your money on this set. I've used both the small and medium roller on three trips and both are ripping. The medium doesn't roll correctly and the zipper area has torn. The smaller roller rolls ok but the stitching is coming lose and there are tears despite its light use. Hoping I can get Amazon to replace these items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of buying 2 of these suitcases in May 2018. The condition was supposed to have been "like new" and just the original packaging might have some damage. Not true. They haven't been abused by baggage handlers; they haven't made it onto an airplane yet. They were only used on 2 short road trips and, already, both have defective zippers. Samsonite refuses to honor the warranty because they were not purchased "new." We were screwed twice - by Amazon for representing the suitcases as "like new" (they admittedly did look new) and by Samsonite for refusing to warrantee the defective zippers. We have purchased Samsonite luggage for many years but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for air travel
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is perfect as a carry-on. Sturdy and well made, it also survived with no issues once it had to be gate checked due to a full flight. I was able to get about a weeks worth of clothes and shoes in there along with toiletries. Admittedly, they were spring and summery type clothes, bulkier clothes like sweaters will obviously be a bit less. The four spinners are a must and work well when rushing through a crowded airport. I plan on making this my go-to bag for all travel. I'd definitely get this again.
